title: About Us
content: Averdem-Tech is a family-owned company with over 5 years of experience in delivering top-notch tech solutions. We've had the privilege of working with major brands like Toyota, helping them redesign their aftermarket store, Buff, where we developed a fast and reliable PWA, and Cervera, for whom we built a seamless e-commerce platform. Our expertise lies in e-commerce, PWA development, and UI/UX design. We're here to help businesses of all sizes thrive in the digital world.
